channel.title: Routers
channel.description: What are some good routers I could buy from bestbuy, preferably cheap. Just going to use for wireless to laptop, 360, and itouch. Something that will last a while. Thanks.

item.title: Routers
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I’d recommend anything that will run dd-wrt, look on dd-wrt.com for supported routers.

Read full topic

item.title: Routers
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

I’ve got a Buffalo WHR-G54S that I got for $40-50 at Best Buy. This was a while back, I’m sure the router’s outdated by now… But I installed Tomato on it, and tbh I’ve never really had any problems with it. I use it as both a wireless and wired router in my house(it actually feeds a bigger router that feeds all the ethernet ports in my home, as well as providing wifi), and I can’t think of anything to complain about.

I don’t know that it’s so much the hardware as it is firmware. Maybe I’m just a Tomato fanboy but I don’t know that it matters all too much on the hardware :o

Read full topic
